name: Namaste
description:
The colors in this yarn make me feel so relaxed and peaceful.  Earthy greens mixed in with the occassional fun pop of yellow sunshine.

180 yards / 165 m

Handspun Shetland Wool
2 Ply
DK Weight
3.5mm - 5.5mm needles

This yarn will felt.
Hand wash in cool water with wool wash.
Roll in a towel to squeeze out excess moisture.
Lay flat to dry.

name: Winter Sun
description:
This yarn just makes me want to curl up in a cozy chair and knit something snuggly.  Fuchsia, pinks, golden yellows, and earthy browns make this a cozy delight. 

180 yards / 164 m

Handspun Shetland wool
2 Ply
DK Weight
3.5mm - 5.5mm needles

This yarn will felt.
Hand wash in cool water with wool wash.
Roll in a towel to squeeze out excess moisture.
Lay flat to dry.

name: Vulpse Vulpse
description:
I love all the wonderful shades of brown, rust, taupe, and grey in this fiber.  This yarn is bouncy and next-to-the-skin soft and would make an amazing hat, cowl, or mittens. 

180 yards / 164 m

Handspun Targhee wool
2 Ply
DK Weight
3.5mm - 5.5mm needles

This yarn will felt.  
Hand wash in cool water with wool wash.  
Roll in a towel to squeeze out excess moisture.  
Lay flat to dry.

name: Confetti
description:
This yarn has been handspun in a  delightful blend of of alpaca, merino, silk, and mohair in a rainbow of hues.  It would be perfect as part of a fabulous knit or crocheted shawl.  

346 yards / 316 m
Fingering weight singles
2.0mm - 3.5mm needles
